description:
Includes Sublime Text 3 AND

      * Package Control
      * subl alias for Powershell

    Sublime Text may be downloaded and evaluated for free, however a license must be purchased for continued use.
    This brings the Sublime Text full installation version to your system, which has a built-in auto-update mechanism.  Furthermore, Sublime Package Control is included.
summary: Sublime Text 3 is a sophisticated text editor for code, html and prose. You'll love the slick user interface and extraordinary features.  Includes Package Control.
author: Jon Skinner
